saveTill() - Method in class uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.DataManager
save the current till by calling the save() method in Till writes the current date and time according to ISO 8601 as the title of the .xml document call methods to calculate the total of the till and than add that data in the Order class all tills are saved to the Tills folder
